headline: Hey, I'm Grayson!
summary: I'm a Los Angeles based freelance backend developer who builds web developments and API solutions. Delivering relevant value to clients always excites me and helps me guarantee that my products are consistently built to modern quality. I specialize in Java, React.js, Django/Python, RESTful (+ GraphQL) APIs, and AWS infrastructure.

I have experience working across multiple domains including, but not limited to, building out an extensible API platform in eCommerce, and integrating various payment service providers for an aggregate payment solution.
On a more personal note, I spend more than I should by being a foodie, find myself always calculating to the local currency wherever I travel to, and currently have a kitty walking on my keyboard.
